answers.answer: I'm on the same boat here I had preeclampsia for my first and i'm worried about it coming later in this pregnancy now that I know the symptoms I just plan on watching out for them and hopefully everything will be fine.
Well i'm still pretty early in my pregnancy i'm only 13 weeks, but my dr didn't talk about any medications she just said they would keep a close look at my urine tests and blood pressure as we go

Wow I had no idea I was planning to ask my doctor thank you so much for your advice i'm not a big water lover, but it's for a good cause. I hope you and your baby will be okay throughout this pregnancy also(:
Thank you and yes we should thats very true different countries have different methods i'm from the U.S and you?

question: I had preeclampsia in my first pregnancy and it end up with emergency c section on 36+5, my daughter was perfectly healthy but small weight.Im pregnant again 21 weeks now, till now i didnt have any problemWhat should be bloodpressure on this weeks?If you had the same problem, which precuations your doctor took?
title: Preeclampsia
